question.title: Application Insights shows failures as if they are in the library and not in my application
question.body:
I have integrated Application Insights into my Spring Boot application. When there are exceptions it lists location of the exceptions as if they are occurring in the library level. But I cannot fix those libraries. Would be useful if it lists location of the exceptions in my application.

In other words now it shows the exception occurs at org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.ExchangeFunctions:111 but it is very useless for me. Is it possible to make it so that it show location in my own app like at com.example.test.MyOwnService:123?
